text: [Music]
you
hi I'm Jodi Nicola from Amazon Web
Services today I'm going to guide you
through creating and deploying your
first deep learning model with AWS deep
lens AWS deep lens is a fully
programmable video camera that comes
with tutorials code and pre-trained
models that are designed to expand your
deep learning skills in this tutorial
you will use one of the pre trained
models that comes with deep lens to
create an object detection project you
will need a device in order to complete
this tutorial if you don't have one you
can order now on amazon.com if you want
to view the project output on a monitor
you will also need keyboard mouse
monitor and a micro HDMI cable along
with the USB hub let's get started enter
the AWS management console when the
screen loads enter your username and
password to get started
then type deep lens in the search bar
and select AWS D plans to open the
console in this step you will create a
new project in the AWS deep lens console
using one of the pre-populated project
templates the console should open on the
projects screen where you'll see a empty
project list select create a new project
on the top right choose use a project
template as a project type and select
object detection from the project
templates list
[Music]
scroll down the screen and select next
accept the default values in the project
name and description fields on the
project content screen accept the
default values for the model and the
function and select create in this step
you will deploy the object detection
project to your AWS seaplanes device
verify that the project was created
successfully and selected from the list
to start the deployment flow choose the
radio button for the project and select
deploy to device on the target device
screen choose your device from the list
and select review now it's time to
review the details of the deployment and
select deploy on the AWS deep lines
console you can track the progress of
the deployment it can take a few minutes
to transfer a large model to the device
once your project is deployed select
view output choose your browser and
follow the instructions to import your
streaming certificate after importing
the certificate choose view stream to
view the output if this is your first
time the browser may ask you to select
the certificate if the browser has
automatically selected the certificate
choose ok the browser will then ask if
you'd like to add the security exception
of the exception and continue now you
should see the output from AWS deep lens
on the monitor you're all set to go
start detecting your objects get started
by pointing the AWS deep lens at your
laptop or water bottle to see what
happens
congratulations you have created your
first deep learning computer vision
project you can now play around the
other project templates try extending
your project functionality with AWS
lambda or train a deep learning model
using Amazon sage maker thanks for
watching
